personalInfo.name: Dixanta Nath Shrestha
personalInfo.title: Full Stack Developer & IT Professional
personalInfo.summary: Passionate full-stack developer with expertise in modern web technologies, cloud computing, and project management. Experienced in building scalable applications and leading development teams.

education.university: Asia Pacific University of Innovation and Technology (Affiliation)
education.description: Advanced studies in Information Technology management, combining technical expertise with business skills.

education.university: Asia Pacific University of Innovation and Technology (Affiliation)
education.description: Comprehensive education in business and technology fundamentals with practical experience in software development and project management.

professionalExperience.description: Leading full-stack development of a comprehensive e-commerce platform, managing both technical implementation and project coordination.
responsibilities: Architected and developed scalable e-commerce platform using modern web technologies
Led development team and coordinated project timelines and deliverables
Implemented secure payment systems and user authentication
Optimized application performance and user experience
Managed database design and API development

professionalExperience.description: Frontend development internship focusing on React components optimization and custom solutions for the Providhy project.
responsibilities: Built and optimized React components for the Providhy project, improving UI/UX for purchase, sales, and master dashboard
Developed a custom Nepali date picker from scratch, solving the limitations of existing libraries
Refactored and streamlined frontend code, boosting performance, reusability, and maintainability
Worked closely with cross-functional teams to deliver solutions that aligned with project requirements
achievements: Created custom Nepali date picker solving library limitations
Improved frontend performance through code refactoring
Enhanced UI/UX for multiple dashboard components

leadershipAndVolunteerExperience.description: Led the student body representation and collaborated with administration for student welfare initiatives.
responsibilities: Represented the student body in administrative meetings
Collaborated with administration for student welfare initiatives
Led the organization of Winter Fest 2024
Advocated for student rights and concerns
Facilitated communication between students and faculty

leadershipAndVolunteerExperience.description: Provided strategic advice and support in planning and executing HackxLBEF hackathon event.
responsibilities: Provided advice and support in planning and executing HackxLBEF
Contributed to event strategy and logistics
Mentored participants during the hackathon
Ensured smooth execution of technical events
achievements: Contributed to the success of HackxLBEF

leadershipAndVolunteerExperience.description: Led the organization and execution of Dashain Fest 2024, managing all aspects of the cultural celebration.
responsibilities: Planned and coordinated Dashain Fest 2024
Managed event logistics and team coordination
Coordinated with vendors and sponsors
Ensured cultural authenticity and student engagement
achievements: Increased student participation in cultural events

leadershipAndVolunteerExperience.position: Head of Social and ECA Club
leadershipAndVolunteerExperience.description: Led the Social and Extra-Curricular Activities (ECA) club, organizing various events and fostering student engagement.

Organized Christmas Fest 2022
Planned and executed various social events
